00036 #ifndef PCZCAMERA_H
00037 #define PCZCAMERA_H
00038 
00039 #include <OgreCamera.h>

00042 #include "OgrePCZFrustum.h"
00043 #include "OgrePCZPrerequisites.h"
00044 
00045 namespace Ogre
00046 {
00047     #define MAX_EXTRA_CULLING_PLANES    40
00048 
00049     class PCZone;
00050 
00051 
00056     class _OgrePCZPluginExport PCZCamera : public Camera
00057     {
00058     public:
00060         enum Visibility
00061         {
00062             NONE,
00063             PARTIAL,
00064             FULL
00065         };
00066 
00067         /* Standard constructor */
00068         PCZCamera( const String& name, SceneManager* sm );
00069         /* Standard destructor */
00070         ~PCZCamera();
00071 
00076         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const;
00077 
00078         /* Overridden isVisible function for aabb */
00079         virtual bool isVisible( const AxisAlignedBox &bound, FrustumPlane *culledBy=0) const;
00080 
00081         /* isVisible() function for portals */
00082         bool isVisible(PortalBase* portal, FrustumPlane* culledBy = 0) const;
00083 
00086         bool isVisibile( const AxisAlignedBox &bound );
00087 
00090         PCZCamera::Visibility getVisibility( const AxisAlignedBox &bound );
00091 
00093         void setProjectionType(ProjectionType pt);
00094 
00095         /* Update function (currently used for making sure the origin stuff for the
00096            extra culling frustum is up to date */
00097         void update(void);
00098 
00099         // calculate extra culling planes from portal and camera 
00100         // origin and add to list of extra culling planes
00101         int addPortalCullingPlanes(PortalBase* portal);
00102         // remove extra culling planes created from the given portal
00103         void removePortalCullingPlanes(PortalBase* portal);
00104         // remove all extra culling planes
00105         void removeAllExtraCullingPlanes(void);
00106     protected:
00107         AxisAlignedBox mBox;
00108         PCZFrustum mExtraCullingFrustum;
00109     };
